definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="62" pinned="false" w="243">Runs Update time script designed for adding new variables to the block after the mod version changes.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="block_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">BlockVersion</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:nwtgAutomationModVersion</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure_at"><field name="procedure">AutoTreeFarmMachineVersionUpdateScript</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement><next><block type="call_procedure_at"><field name="procedure">AutoTreeFarmMachineToggleStateScript</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Runs the on/off block script</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
